entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 10:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

Temperature: 5.4°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: SE 30 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
